  • Method Details

    • isPresent

      boolean isPresent() throws Exception
      Verify if the pinpad is present.
      Returns:
      True, If pinpad is present.
      False, If pinpad is not present
      Throws:
      Exception - If it was not possible to verify the presence of the pinpad.
      -1, For pinpad access library was not found.
      Other negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • setDisplayMessage

      int setDisplayMessage(String message)
      Set message to be displayed in the pinpad.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be displayed in the pinpad.
      Returns:
      0, OK. The message was set.
      Any negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • setDisplayMessage

      int setDisplayMessage(String message, boolean persistent)
      Set message to be displayed in the pinpad.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be displayed in the pinpad.
      persistent - If true, set the message to be always shown when the pinpad is not in use.
      Returns:
      0, OK. The message was set.
      Any negative number, Errors internally detected by the routine.

    • readYesNo

      int readYesNo(String message)
      Asks for a confirmation in the pinpad.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be displayed in the pinpad during the reading.
      Returns:
      1, Confirm key pressed.
      0, Cancel key pressed.
      Other value, Error while trying to communicate with the pinpad.
